comments.body: Why isn't this recipe noarch: python?

because of the pyqt==5.12.3, only the windows version has the Multimedia module incorporated, Linux and MacOS lack it ... same issue as with QScreenCast which this package relays on.
so for the time being we can only do a windows package. Once the pyqt=5.15.x is there (we are going to work on that with Quansight and Anaconda) then we can enable all OS-es.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  skip: True  # [not win]

requirements:
